price: 20.Tama korosih cirdeynaani Mucammadal ﷺ kay Rabbik kay numma tascasse astootiy tambullee macah kaal obsime waytaah iyyan, toysa Nabiyow cagalah qellitteemih ixxiga Yallak sa num maliiy ni- fan kee sin fan Yalli meklelek qambaala! diggah anu siini luk qambaalak keenik ixxic!
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi faqul innamā al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
